skill_1_description: Proficient in Python for data manipulation, analysis, and visualization, with hands-on experience in ETL processes, machine learning, and workflow automation.
skill_2_description: Familiar with R for statistical analysis and data visualization. Adept at utilizing packages such as ggplot2, caret, dplyr, and tidyverse to conduct exploratory data analysis.
skill_3_description: Proficient in SQL for querying and managing relational databases. Experienced in writing efficient queries, joining tables, and performing data transformations.
skill_4_description: Proficient in creating interactive dashboards and reports that deliver actionable insights.
skill_5_description: Knowledgeable in using Excel for organizing, analyzing, and reporting data. Comfortable with pivot tables and advanced functions.
skill_6_description: Proficient in version control using Git and GitHub, managing repositories, collaborating on projects, and handling branches effectively.
skill_7_description: Proficient in using Docker for container creation, management, and orchestration. Capable of setting up isolated environments for application development and deployment, optimizing project portability and scalability.
